tool_description: Creates comprehensive temperature compliance reports for regulatory audits, management review, and HACCP documentation.

report_type.description: Report format: daily_summary, weekly_compliance, audit_preparation, violation_analysis, trend_report

location_filter.description: Specific locations to include in report

include_violations.description: Whether to include detailed violation information

include_charts.description: Whether to generate temperature trend charts

regulatory_format.description: Compliance format: FDA_standard, USDA_FSIS, local_health_dept, HACCP_log

confidentiality_level.description: Report sensitivity: public, internal, restricted, confidential

export_format.description: Output format: pdf, excel, csv, json

error_messages: Invalid report_type: Must be one of [daily_summary, weekly_compliance, audit_preparation, violation_analysis, trend_report].
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date, both in valid ISO 8601 format.
Date range too large: Maximum report period is 365 days.
Invalid regulatory_format: Must be one of [FDA_standard, USDA_FSIS, local_health_dept, HACCP_log].
Invalid confidentiality_level: Must be one of [public, internal, restricted, confidential].
Invalid export_format: Must be one of [pdf, excel, csv, json].
Insufficient data: Not enough temperature data available for specified date range and locations.
Location filter invalid: One or more specified locations not found in system.
usage: Specify report_type, start_date, and end_date. Optionally filter by locations, configure inclusion options, set regulatory format, and choose export format. Tool generates comprehensive compliance documentation.

generation_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when report was created

total_readings.description: Number of temperature readings included in report

violations_found.description: Total number of compliance violations detected

report_file_path.description: Location where generated report file is stored
